description: This file is an HTML document for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and scripts for dynamic data loading and user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide data or objects.
